_header: I think all day I think of nought

OxfMert248.Transcription:
I þinge al day I þinge of nowthOf nowth I set all my
                    chowthnowth of owth brynkis me tyl nowthbe wor vertyr I chowchyt
                    nowth
OxfMert248.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 54.
